description:
The next task for the Sega Hard girls is to go into the world of Shining Force Cross Excelia Zenith wearing costumes from Phantasy Star Online 2.  They look forward to cute outfits, but instead are given Rappy suits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Rappy, Saturn Rappy, Mega Rappy, ?? Rappy
